transcript: I have over three years of experience in back-end development and in various frameworks like .NET, Spring Boot and Node.js. So, I also love this field because it contains all the business logic and the optimizations and I believe unique experiences because I have an experience in multiple frameworks, multiple databases whether it is SQL or NoSQL and also Gen AI. I also have experience in building Gen AI apps which is the industry trend these days.

audio_metrics.analysis_summary: work on pacing, fairly confident, professional tone.
